comment.author: 96466543@N02
comment._content:
What a lovely old ship.
Has anyone else noticed that the 'Favorites' star isn't working?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/96466543@N02] Favourites star working for me - Flickr is still very glitchy,  and I particularly miss the Preview Comment button.

The original size of this is ENORMOUS, and THETIS is written on the bow.  I thought it might have been the CAPTAIN COOK (1), the Pilot Steamer.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Aha! Snap! The same image at State Records NSW (4481_a026_000478). Theirs might well be the original glass plate negative. investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp... The State Records NSW blurb - "The pilot steamer Thetis, built in 1868 for the New South Wales Department of Public Works. In 1871 the Thetis was placed in temporary service as Sydney's Pilot Steamer until 1877." The blurbs for this particular Series at SRNSW are notoriously inaccurate, so let's see if we can improve on the history of this wonderful ship ...

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/96466543@N02] Not a lot!  Dreadful way to treat paying customers!  I just hope the whole thing doesn't go belly-up anytime soon.  But I doubt if they care at Yahoo!

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/96466543@N02] A nice collection of images :) We are providing our feedback to Flickr directly and have been following some of the discussions about the sites 'updates' - it seems everyone is having similar issues so hopefully these can be resolved!
